issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Is not a bug in our product
resolution.name: Not Our Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
I have updated to the last appcelerator version and now it's impossible for me to create an APK..  i receive this error

fields.summary: Can't create a .apk for my project

comments.body: You need to check your node version

Please use a supported NodeJS version (e.g. 4.6.x) as documented [here|http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/Titanium_Compatibility_Matrix-section-29004837_TitaniumCompatibilityMatrix-Node.js]. And our latest SDK is 6.0.0.GA, released two weeks ago :-)
I have the last version of node (7.2.0) and I have the last version of appcelerator (4.8) and the last SDK (6.0.0) and nothing works...
Please have a look at the matrix Hans posted. The maximum supported node version is 4.6.x at the moment
oo Sorry.. I don't understand really good... So all right I put the 4.6.x and work fine
